sentences.sentence: The value of America, Japan, India and China decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2014.
There is an unusual rise in 2013 of Japan.
China has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014.

sentences.sentence: The value of America, Japan, India and China decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2014.
There is an unusual rise in 2013 of Japan.
China has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014.
